text: Steve Roloff is a paralympic equestrian from the United States. Steve competed in the 1984 Summer Paralympics and won a gold medal in Equestrian for Elementary Walk/Trot C3/6. ==References== == External links == * Category:Living people Category:American male equestrians Category:Paralympic equestrians of the United States Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Paralympic medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Steve Roloff
